name: Acorn-tastrophe
description:
Controls:

WASD to move. Using arrow keys will cause animations for the squirrel to not work.

Left Shift to sprint.

Spacebar to jump.

ESC to pause game.

Use your mouse to look around. Left clicking on the screen while looking around with your mouse will reajust the center point for you cursor to look around.

Objective: Collect acorns to increase your score. Watch out for the wildlife and the humans outside of the village. If you get caught by them, you will have to restart.

This game is a work in progress and will continue to change.

What I plan to add in the future:

  • More animations for Max.
  • Lose and win screen.
  • Fixing the character sliding while the player moves.
  • and so much more

For the acorn model:

This work is based on "PUSHILIN Acorn by Google Poly" (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/pushilin-acorn-by-google-poly-15768def8e6042a7b7f4ac59f5ba5e0d) by kulioner (https://sketchfab.com/kulioner) licensed under CC-BY-4.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

For the menu music:

"Pause-Save Menu" by LudoLoon Studio. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/save-pause-menu-fre...

For the in game music:

"Aspiration Woods" by Joe Gallagher. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/free-orchestral-mus...
